titleText: Volatility Standouts Report at close of afterhours trading - 4/13/2018, 7:32:28 AM
mainText: Markets closed higher across the board today while fears of weaponized response in Syria decreased. Shares of VIX were trading about 4% lower today, from a drop of near highs of $40.00 to $38.64. Standout stock volatilities include FB (Facebook) at a 90% 52 week percentile, and JPM (J.P. Morgan Chase) at an 88% percentile. The general sentiment found at market close for volatility is a continuing pattern of decreasing volatility. As of 6:30 PM Eastern Time, volatility futures were trading lower.
